extra_video_settings.tooltip.fov_effect_: Controls how much the field of view changes with movement speed.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.screen_effe: Controls the intensity of screen distortion effects like nausea.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.darkness_ef: Controls the intensity of the Darkness effect pulsing.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.damage_tilt: Controls how much the camera tilts when taking damage.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.glint_speed: Controls the speed of the enchantment glint animation.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.glint_stren: Controls the intensity of the enchantment glint.
extra_video_settings.tooltip.entity_shad: Toggles the display of entity shadows on the ground.
